title: Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument: Partners
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners            Partners       There are many ways you can support Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument...      Friends of the Florissant Fossil Beds, Inc.  In 1987, the Friends of the Florissant Fossil Beds, Inc. was organized by a group of dedicated individuals interested in assisting the National Park Service in its mission to preserve and protect our national treasures. As a non-profit organization, the Friend's mission is to secure resources to help preserve the fossils and promote programs activities that enhance the Monument's educational, research, and scientific objectives. To learn more about our Friends group please visit their website at www.fossilbeds.org.        Logo of the Rocky Mountain Conservancy   Rocky Mountain Conservancy The bookstore at Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument is administered by the Rocky Mountain Conservancy. RMC sells items to support the interpretive and educational programs of Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument. There is a wide selection of natural and local history books, children's nature books, as well as maps, nature videos, audio CDs and games. Membership in the RMC offers the benefit of discounts at the bookstore, as well as those at Rocky Mountain National Park and other sites. Members of the RMC receive a 15% discount on publications, discounts on seminars at Rocky Mountain National Park, complimentary copies of the RMC newspaper, and the RMC quarterly newsletter. For more information please visit the RMNA website at www.rmconservancy.org
